nodes.bodyText: This works for maven, as it points to target
I have no idea if this works in Gradle - I just copied what I did for Maven
@glefloch do you know if this will work for Gradle?

@geoand, I just ran a quick test.
The launchingModulePath points to build/classes/java/main. If you need to point to the module build dir, you can use launchingModule.getBuildDir() which points to build/or if you need the module root directory, you can use launchingModule.getProjectRoot(). So I think the should be .setTargetDirectory(launchingModule.getProjectRoot())
